textTestimonials.text: We were so worried about hidden costs with caterers. WeddingNuts gave us 3 verified options in Delhi, and we saved almost 20% compared to other quotes. The food was amazing!
textTestimonials.author: Rahul & Priya
textTestimonials.subtitle: Married Dec 2025

textTestimonials.text: The verified vendor list was a lifesaver. We found our photographer and decor team within a week. Highly recommended for anyone planning an Indian wedding.
textTestimonials.author: Amit & Meera
textTestimonials.subtitle: Married Jan 2026

textTestimonials.text: I loved the transparency. No running around, just good options that fit our budget. The support team was also very helpful.
textTestimonials.author: Sanya & Rohan
textTestimonials.subtitle: Married Nov 2025

textTestimonials.text: We were worried about managing 500 guests, but WeddingNuts made it look effortless. Every logistical detail was handled perfectly.
textTestimonials.author: Rahul & Simran
textTestimonials.subtitle: Bangalore, Dec 2024

textTestimonials.text: The decor was exactly what I dreamed of. They took my Pinterest board and brought it to life! Highly recommend their design team.
textTestimonials.author: Meera K.
textTestimonials.subtitle: Udaipur, Jan 2025
